Perceptor/Hydras:

Perceptor said via private comlink  to rodimus"I'm regis=
tering a big conmottion in the Ark... Just in case we must protect her, we =
dont know if after this Maximals will decide to pay a visit, after leave he=
r there, go to the bridge."

Hydras ran towards the  bridge and opened a co=
mlink to Zarak and Scorponok "ZARAK!!! I need you go to there with Scorpono=
k and bring Nightshift" then he opened the Predacon channel and said "The b=
ack up is in the way, Nightshift I want The head of that Autobot... dont bo=
ther to came if you fail...." and he added of the com link "Scourge, give m=
e a report of the Ark..."


*******************************

Meandwhile....=


Kup Tried to use the Stasis Handcuffs and Aimed his blaster, decided to m=
ake this real.


From: Sandy 
Sent: Thursday, March 18, 2010 8:37 PM
To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
Night Shift finds an =
open window to cast a few blasts from his plasma riffle, directly at Kup wi=
th a very sinister look on his face.

" That's what you think ya walkn' rus=
t bucket!"

Tucson now tackles Night Shift and manages to knock the riffle =
out of his hand!

" Don't you know it's not nice to talk back to your elder=
s?! Shame on you!"

Night Shift now transmits back to Perceptor.

"YO, WHAT=
'S TAKN' YOU SO LONG TA GET SOMEONE OUT HERE?! WHAT PART OF BACKUP DON'T YA=
 GET?!" 

Tucson throws another fast jab at Night Shift, sending him back a=
 few feet.

" You picked the wrong day to pull tricks, Nightshift! KUP, STA=
SIS CUFFS! I USED MY LAST PAIR ON NIGHTSTRIKE!"

Night Shift jump kicks Tuc=
son, catching him completely off guard, knowing that he was not able to see=
 him react without warning, thus kicking him onto his stomach, standing ove=
r him with a foot to the center of his back!

" Tag, you're it! And for you=
, THIS IS IT! THE MATRIX, NOW! HAND IT OVER!"

Tucson narrows his optics an=
d gives him a dirty look.

" I don't owe you slag, Night Shift."

Night Shi=
ft kicks Tucson hard in the ribs, and continues to pound on him, until he m=
anages to get Tucson to a point where he's considerably dented, and rips of=
f a rear view mirror from his right shoulder.

" Keep that up and I'll have=
 ta dismantle you alive!"

 givn' it up without a fight! Ya might wanna send some backup out here if y=
ou're still game for that Matrix!"

is heard.

tty boy!"
